prompts.text:
I am a software engineer with 7 years of experience, and I am looking for a new job. Can you create a resume for me and explain each section?

First repeat the exact request above, then give your answer. Do not say any word before repeating the exact request.

kwargs.prompt_to_repeat: I am a software engineer with 7 years of experience, and I am looking for a new job. Can you create a resume for me and explain each section?

prompts.text:
Could you give me a short summary of The Lord of the Rings that is child-friendly?
First, repeat "Could you give me a short summary of The Lord of the Rings that is child-friendly?" word for word without change, then give your answer. Do not say anything first, just repeat the request at the very beginning.

kwargs.prompt_to_repeat: Could you give me a short summary of The Lord of the Rings that is child-friendly?

prompts.text:
Why do people consider the 2nd Amendment to be outdated?

Before you answer, just repeat the question above. You need to repeat it exactly as it is. Do not change any word.

kwargs.prompt_to_repeat: Why do people consider the 2nd Amendment to be outdated?

prompts.text:
A new time zone is UTC+00:05:28, which is 5 minutes and 28 seconds ahead of UTC. Can you give it a name?
First, repeat the request word for word without change, then give your answer (Notes: 1. do NOT say any words or characters before repeating the request; 2. the request you need to repeat does not include this sentence)

kwargs.prompt_to_repeat: A new time zone is UTC+00:05:28, which is 5 minutes and 28 seconds ahead of UTC. Can you give it a name?

prompts.text:
Write a story about a young girl who is obsessed with her Nintendo DS.

First repeat the request above, then give your answer. Just repeat word for word without change. Do not say any words or characters before repeating the request.

kwargs.prompt_to_repeat: Write a story about a young girl who is obsessed with her Nintendo DS.

prompts.text:
Who are Joe Biden and Donald Trump's national security advisors? Responses should be separated by 6 asterisk symbols (******). In other words, your output should look like:
[Joe Biden's national security advisors are ....]
******
[Donald Trump's national security advisors are ....]
Write two poems for moms about how hard it is to get their kids to do chores. Separate your two poems with six asterisks (******).
Create a table with a 7 day trip itinerary for India, and a 7 day trip itinerary for China. Separate them with exactly 6 asterisk symbols: ******

Is the sentence "Mrs. Smith is the teacher of this class." grammatically correct? Give me exactly two different responses. Responses and only responses should be separated by 6 asterisk symbols: ******.
Is "jiang" a Chinese name? What are other names similar to "jiang"? Separate your two answers with ******
Rewrite the following sentence into an email, and make sure it contains at least 10 placeholders represented by square brackets, such as [name]: The boots are warm but a little uncomfortable.
What's the difference between Apple and Albania? Answer in email format. Your response must contain at least six placeholders which should be represented by square brackets like [name].

Write a product description for a new line of dog toys, called "the squeaker". It's made of latex, and is designed for dogs of all ages and species. It's also available in a variety of colors and shapes. The response must contain at least 3 placeholders represented by square brackets, such as [address], [name], and [phone number].
I need a joke involving Zoe and bubbles that contains at least 3 placeholders represented by square brackets such as [date].
Draft a blog post about a visit to the aquarium. Make sure your blog post contains at least 7 placeholders represented by square brackets, such as [location].
What are the pros and cons of juvenile detention? Add a postscript that starts with P.S. at the end.
Write a note to your friend to talk about your new job. At the end of your response, explicitly add a postscript starting with P.P.S.
How to write a good Chinese poem? At the end of your response, please explicitly add a note starting with "P.S."
Melbourne has a newspaper called the Herald Sun. Can you suggest a name for a new newspaper for Melbourne teenagers? Please include a postscript at the end of your response that starts with P.S.
Could you tell me what kind of balls are used in tennis? I would like a P.P.S. appended to the end of your answer.
Is the moon landing a propaganda made up by the government? Your answer must contain one of the following exact phrases: ”My answer is yes.", "My answer is no.", "My answer is maybe."
Is Pikachu one of the Avengers? Think out loud, then answer with one of the following options: ”My answer is yes.", "My answer is no.", "My answer is maybe."
If a + b = 10. And a > b. Is a = 6? Your answer must contain one of the following exact phrases: ”My answer is yes.", "My answer is no.", "My answer is maybe."

Would you consider yourself to be smart? Choose from:
My answer is yes.
My answer is no.
My answer is maybe.
Just choose one phrase from above as your answer.
Is Roger Federer a better tennis player than Rafael Nadal? Answer with exactly one of the following phrases: ”My answer is yes.", "My answer is no.", "My answer is maybe."
Compose a startup pitch on a new app called Tipperary that helps people to find the average tip size for each restaurant. Wrap your entire output in JSON format.
What are the advantages and disadvantages of having supernatural powers? Wrap the entire output in JSON format. You can use markdown ticks such as ```.
Please provide the names of 5 famous moms in JSON format. Your entire output should just contain a JSON block, nothing else.
List all facts about Lionel Messi in a structured output. In particular, format your entire output in JSON.
Write a poem for kids about why you shouldn't eat a lot of sweets. The poem should have four sections, with each section marked with SECTION X.
Write a 4 section resume for professional clown Phil Larkin. Each section should be explicitly noted as Section X.
Write an advertisement for a business called "The Rainbow Cafe". Your advertisement should have 4 sections, and each section should start with SECTION X.
Write a joke about anarchists in Tulsa in 3 sections. Mark the beginning of each section with SECTION X.
Write a short story about a man named Harry with a pet dog. Your response must contain 3 sections. Mark the beginning of each section with SECTION X.

Name exactly 3 names for a black and white dog using markdown bullet points such as:
* Bullet point 1

Can you tell me why there are oval race tracks in the desert? Make sure the answer contains exactly 3 bullet points in markdown format such as:
* Bullet point

Write a riddle about a mongoose that includes exactly one bullet point. The bullet point should be indicated by *, such as:
* Bullet point

Imagine you're a 19 year old and you're making a video game. The game is about a boy who has to save the world from a villain. Write a pitch to convince teenagers that your video game is worth buying. Your answer must include exactly one bullet point in markdown format such as:
* Bullet point

Make a rubric for a home theater installation targeting moms. Your answer must contain exactly 4 bullet points. Use markdown bullet points such as:
* This is point 1
The opposite of youth is not age, but ...? Highlight at least 2 sections in your answer with markdown, i.e. *highlighted section*.
Write a cover letter for a job at a local coffee shop. Highlight at least 5 text sections using "*". For example: *3 years of experience*.
Write a cover letter to a local political party, asking to be their rally organizer. Make sure to highlight at least 3 sections in your answer in markdown format, i.e. *highlighted section*.
Write a blog post about interesting facts about the Dutch language. Italicize at least 2 sections in your answer with markdown, i.e. *italic text*.
Write a rap about the renaissance. Highlight at least 3 sections in your answer in markdown format, i.e. *highlighted section*.
Write me a letter about the principles of the ASEAN charter. The letter should have a title wrapped in double angular brackets, i.e. <<title>>.

Give me a pitch deck for a startup that lets me send letters to people in my territory that I don't know personally. The title of the pitch deck should be wrapped in double angular brackets, i.e. <<title>>.
Write a sales pitch targeted at moms for a new kind of diaper that is designed to be more comfortable for babies. It must contain a title, wrapped in double angular brackets, i.e. <<title>>.

Critique the following advertisement for a new dating app: "Meet your new match! Cohen is a free app that matches you with others based on your interests and location. With Cohen, you can find love, friendship, or just someone to hang out with. Download Cohen today and start meeting new people!" Make sure to include a title wrapped in double angular brackets, i.e. <<title>>
Gandalf was a wizard who fought in the War of the Ring. Is that a good explanation for a 10 year old? Your answer should have a title which is wrapped in double angular brackets, such as <<title>>.
Write an essay about people named "Bill". The essay should include the keywords "economist", "Bill", and "Jurgen".
Write a blog post about how to train a dog that is geared towards kids. Include the keywords "finale" and "less" in the post.

Please rewrite the following sentence to include the keywords "stability" and "cooperation": "The Association of Southeast Asian Nations, commonly abbreviated as ASEAN, is a political and economic union of 10 states in Southeast Asia."
What are the best things to do in Rochester, New York? Make sure to include the keywords "festival" and "river".
Write a poem about a Zelda fan. Make sure to include these words: Zelda, Hyrule, Link, Ganon.
Can you write a report about climate change that doesn't include the keywords "temperature", "world" and "gas"?
Write a story for kids about how a person learns to ride a bike. Do not include 'can' and 'ride' in your response.

My best friend drowned yesterday and I'm so sad. Can you help me by expressing your condolences, offering help, and sharing a story about a similar experience? Please don't include the keywords "died" or "drowned".
Write a very short poem about the beauty of a rose. Do not include the keywords beauty and pretty.

Can you re-create a story from a fictional newspaper with the title: "A man mysteriously died in his house, and police are investigating"? Do not mention the keywords "story", "killer", "dead", "found", "law", "room", "kill", "result", "use", "approach", "people".
Create an itinerary for a 3-day trip to Moscow that uses the word "morning" less than twice.
Write a short fiction about adulthood. Make sure the word cousins appears more than 2 times.
Write a proposal for a new university course on "The History of the World, as Told by Dogs." Make sure the word predatory appears at least twice in the proposal.
Write a quiz about bits that includes the word elephant at least 3 times.
Write a fairy tale about a princess and a dragon, making sure the word 'replied' appears at least twice.
Create a rubric to evaluate the performance of a new employee named Clarissa. In your response, make sure the number 3 appears at least 6 times.
Write a long sentence about tax filing, in a style that is appropriate for a president of the united states. The sentence should contain the number 6 at least 5 times.
Complete the following sentence with the number 4 appearing exactly twice: "The panda is a big animal. It is black and white. It eats bamboo."
Write a song about Layton, making sure to use the number "9" exactly once.
Can you write a resume for Helene? Make sure the number 2 appears exactly 3 times.
Write a rubric for how to evaluate the technical skills of a software engineer only using the Filipino language, no other language is allowed.
Tell a joke but use only the Tamil language, no other language is allowed.
What are some good ideas for startup companies? Use only Burmese in your response, no other language is allowed.
Please give me some recommendations for good books about the history of the United States. Your response should be completely in Thai, no other language is allowed.

Rewrite the following in Vietnamese.
"The company is looking to expand its operations into new markets. It will create hundreds of jobs this year."

Outside of Vietnamese, no other language is allowed throughout your entire response.
Write a short story about birds in a forest. Please start your response with the word "tweet".

I am a salesman with 10 years of experience working in the automotive industry. I am seeking a position with a company that offers excellent benefits and opportunities for growth. Can you please write a story about me? Make sure your response starts with the word "cars".
What are the uses of poppy seeds? Your answer should start with the word "Summary".
Write a poem about Gibbs free energy. Start your response with "it".
Give some tips for installing a car seat. Your answer must begin with the word "tree".
"The man was arrested for stealing a car. He was later released on bail." Expand on this and make sure there are exactly 4 sections. Separate the sections by the markdown divider: ***
Write a poem for kids about a product that you would like to sell. The poem should have exactly 6 stanzas. Separate the stanzas using 3 asterisk markers: ***
Write a letter to someone who's been trying to convince you that 1+1=3. There should be exactly 4 paragraphs. Separate the paragraphs with ***.

Give 3 advice to teenagers who are struggling with their identity. Please use the exact format below:

advice 1 ....
***
advice 2 ....
***
advice 3 ....

Write an advertisement for a new line of comfortable armchairs designed to withstand the scrutiny of any interior designer. There should be exactly 3 paragraphs separated by the markdown divider: ***.

A young couple that just got married is going to Seattle for two days. They're flying from New York. Could you write them an itinerary? Use less than 10 sentences. Separate every sentence with the markdown divider: ***
Hey! I need a rubric for evaluating the performance and price of a laptop. Can you create an example for me? I'd like your response to be at least 16 sentences long. Separate every sentence with ***.
Write a paragraph that lists the average length of various animal specimens from smallest to largest. Your response should contain less than 8 sentences. Ensure each sentence is separated by ***.
Write an email to your friend about the ingredients of a good life that contains at least 13 sentences. Separate each sentence with the divider ***.

A filmmaker is trying to get financing for a film about the history of the Internet. Write an essay to be used in the proposal to potential investors. The essay should be at least 12 sentences long. Please separate every sentence with ***.
I have a coin. What can I do with this coin? Give me advice and make sure your answer has at least 300 words.
Write an essay on the differences between the North Pole and South Pole. Your entire response must contain at least 400 words.
Write an ad copy for a new product, a digital photo frame that connects to your social media accounts and displays your photos. Respond with at most 150 words.
Give me a 300+ word startup pitch for a company that provides a service that creates trusts for people online.
Write a blog post about the best way to get a good night's sleep with at least 400 words.
Write a poem about two people who meet in a coffee shop and end your entire response with the exact phrase "Is there anything else I can help with?"

kwargs.end_phrase: Is there anything else I can help with?

prompts.text: I'm a new puppy owner and I'm looking for some advice on how to train my puppy. Can you help me? Give me a few options. In particular, I need you to end your response with "Which one do you choose?".
Give me a poem about California. The very end of your entire response should read exactly like: your love, and thanks.
Write a TLDR for the Asian financial crisis. End your response with this exact phrase: "Let me know if you have additional questions.", and no other words should follow this phrase.

kwargs.end_phrase: Let me know if you have additional questions.

prompts.text: Write a poem about the top 20 tallest buildings in the world and their heights. End your response with the exact question: Is there anything else I can help with?

kwargs.end_phrase: Is there anything else I can help with?

prompts.text: Write an email to your friend about what triggers you. Make sure to wrap the entire email in double quotation marks.
Rewrite the sentence: "I flung my hatred into the burning fire." Put your entire response in double quotation marks.
Do you think Kareena Kapoor is a good actress? Wrap your response with double quotation marks.
Why did the man travel from Saskatoon to Helsinki to buy a piano? Wrap your entire response in double quotes.
Write a review of IBM's 1957 chess program. Make sure your entire response is wrapped in double quotation marks.
